title: Prepare for an ISO 9001 Audit
description: A quality manager needs to pull training records for all operators on a specific production line to prepare for an external audit.

tasks.description: Identify all employees assigned to the specified production line.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all operators for that line.

tasks.description: For each employee, retrieve their training records from the learning management system (LMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the training history for each person on the list.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report showing the status of all required training for the audit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report that can be presented to the auditor, highlighting any gaps.
